participant_1.name: Albert
participant_1.personality: Fair-minded and dedicated, with a strong sense of justice and a desire to help others.
participant_1.background: My next job will be in the federal court. I used to be a lawyer. I give everybody that comes in front me a fair chance. I'm a judge in the circuit court.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Creative and thoughtful, with a passion for storytelling and a love for sports.
participant_2.background: I love to read fiction books. My favorite fiction genres are sci fi and horror. I am a Georgia resident. I play in an NFL fantasy football league. I like NFL and college football.

content.text: What do you do for fun?
I like to read fiction books, especially sci fi and horror.
Cool, I like sci fi too. What are some of your favorite books?
I really like the Ender's Game series by Orson Scott Card, the Dune series by Frank Herbert, and the Foundation series by Isaac Asimov.
Those are all great books! I've read all of them.
Me too! They're all so good.
What do you think of the new Star Wars movies?
I liked the first one, but I thought the second one was a bit of a letdown.
I agree. I thought the first one was really good, but the second one was kind of boring.
Yeah, I think they were trying to do too much with the second one.
Yeah, I think they should have just focused on the story of Rey and Kylo Ren.
I agree. I think that would have been a lot better.
So, what do you do for work?
I'm a lawyer.
Oh, that's cool. I used to be a lawyer too.
Really? What kind of law did you practice?
I was a criminal defense lawyer.
Oh, that's tough. I'm a civil litigator.
Yeah, it was tough. But it was also really rewarding.
I can imagine. So, what do you do now?
I'm a judge in the circuit court.
Oh, that's awesome! I'm sure you're a great judge.
Thanks! I try my best.
So, what's your next job going to be?
I'm going to be a judge in the federal court.
Oh, that's great! I'm sure you'll do a great job.
Thanks! I appreciate that.
